H0.text: What animal other than a cat is an integral part of the musical Cats. Raccoon

H1.text: What animal other than a cat is an integral part of the musical Cats. Fox

H2.text: What animal other than a cat is an integral part of the musical Cats. Squirrel

H3.text: What animal other than a cat is an integral part of the musical Cats. Possum

A4.text: Cats is based on the 1939 poetry collection Old Possum's桌子上 Practical Cats by T. S. Eliot.
